trans-unit.source: Represents a reference in a discovery document to an XML Schema Definition (XSD) language schema.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 语言架构中发现文档的引用。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services given, a URL.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服务发现涉及发现可用给定 URL 的 XML Web 服务。

trans-unit.source: A The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 向发现文档，通常具有 a.disco 文件扩展名通常点的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The discovery document contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: 发现文档包含对 XML Web 服务的信息存在的引用。

trans-unit.source: These references can refer to service descriptions, XSD schemas, or other discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 这些引用可以引用的服务说明、 XSD 架构或其他发现文档。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a reference to an XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示对 XSD 架构的引用。

trans-unit.source: Within a discovery document, a reference to an XSD schema is contained within a `schemaRef` XML element.
trans-unit.target: 在发现文档中，对 XSD 架构的引用包含在`schemaRef`XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The `schemaRef` XML element has an XML namespace and a `ref` attribute.
trans-unit.target: `schemaRef` XML 元素具有的 XML 命名空间和`ref`属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the XML namespace must match the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Namespace> constant.
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空间的值必须与匹配<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Namespace>常量。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Namespace>

trans-unit.source: The value of the `ref` attribute is placed in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Ref%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值`ref`属性放入<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Ref%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Ref%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference"></xref> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference"></xref>类使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference"></xref> class using the supplied URL as the XSD schema reference.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference"></xref>类作为 XSD 架构引用使用提供的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL for the XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: XSD 架构的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Ref*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Ref*>属性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Ref*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the default file to use when saving the referenced XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取默认的文件以在保存引用的 XSD 架构时使用的名称。

trans-unit.source: Default name to use when saving the referenced XSD schema to a file.
trans-unit.target: 默认保存到文件的引用的 XSD 架构时要使用的名称。

trans-unit.source: XML namespace for XSD schema references in discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 在发现文档中的 XSD 架构引用的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Within a discovery document, a reference to an XSD schema is contained within a `schemaRef` XML element, which is a part of the XML namespace specified in the Namespace constant.
trans-unit.target: 在发现文档中，对 XSD 架构的引用包含在`schemaRef`XML 元素，它是 Namespace 常量中指定的 XML 命名空间的一部分。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Reads and returns the XSD schema from the passed <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 读取并返回从传递<xref:System.IO.Stream>。</xref:System.IO.Stream> XSD 架构

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>包含 XSD 架构。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> containing the contents of the referenced XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>包含引用的 XSD 架构的内容。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to the referenced XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引用的 XSD 架构的 URL。

trans-unit.source: In a discovery document, a reference to an XSD schema is contained within a `schemaRef` XML element.
trans-unit.target: 在发现文档中，对 XSD 架构的引用包含在`schemaRef`XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The `schemaRef` XML element has a `ref` attribute, which is the URL for the referenced XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: `schemaRef` XML 元素具有`ref`特性，它是引用的 XSD 架构的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property represents the value of the `ref` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A>属性表示的值`ref`属性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL for the referenced XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: 所引用的 XSD 架构 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object representing the XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>表示 XSD 架构的对象。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: If the XSD schema has not been downloaded and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>, an attempt to download and resolve the document is made.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有下载 XSD 架构并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>，下载和解析文档尝试。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object representing the XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>表示 XSD 架构的对象。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- An error occurred during the download or resolution of the XSD schema using <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*>.
trans-unit.target: <>*1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。 -或-在下载或 XSD 架构使用的解决方法过程出错<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""></xref> XML attribute of the XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""></xref>的 XSD 架构的 XML 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""></xref> XML attribute of the XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""> </xref>的 XSD 架构的 XML 属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL for the schema reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该架构引用的 URL。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference> class, the Url property returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Ref%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>类，Url 属性返回的值<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Ref%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.Ref%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>

trans-unit.source: The URL for the referenced XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: 所引用的 XSD 架构 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Writes the passed XSD schema into the passed <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 将写入传递<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>传递的 XSD 架构

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to write into `stream`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>写入`stream`。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> into which the serialized XSD schema is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>序列化的 XSD 架构写入其中。</xref:System.IO.Stream>
